ygData.subject: RE: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There are documented screen-repainting bugs having to do with how much mana you appear to have. I suspect this is another of those, and that you do NOT get
ygData.messageBody:
>> Yup, unless you started off at full mana, in which case you
>> automatically get the extra mana (at least, no white appeared
>> when I played Elegy at FM, whereas the white increased when
>> I played Elegy at less than FM).

>Hmm, I need to retest this to make sure this is what's going
>on. If this is really how it works, then once everyone is FM,
>if you play Elegy, you've essentially just given them free
>mana.

There are documented screen-repainting bugs having to do with how
much mana you appear to have. I suspect this is another of those,
and that you do NOT get free mana.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 8 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
(Blackburrow)
